movie_title: Space saving solar hacks ⏲️ 6 Minute English
introduction: Solar power is key for meeting net-zero targets, but how can we find space to build more solar panel

vocabulary.definition: a cover fixed over something to provide shelter or decoration
vocabulary.example: The canopy over the outdoor dining area protected customers from the sun.

vocabulary.definition: attractive because it offers advantages or pleasures
vocabulary.example: The enticing offer of a free trial encouraged many people to sign up.

vocabulary.definition: decreased quickly in a short time
vocabulary.example: After the announcement, the stock prices tumbled rapidly.

vocabulary.definition: the economic advantages achieved are greater than the economic costs
vocabulary.example: The project became economically feasible once they secured a stable source of funding.

vocabulary.definition: having the form or mathematical properties of a parabola
vocabulary.example: The parabolic mirror was used to focus sunlight onto the solar panel.

vocabulary.definition: reflecting something, especially in a way that gives the appearance of a mirror
vocabulary.example: The design of the building included mirroring windows to reduce heat absorption.
